name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **PHP**, **Symfony**, **Laravel**, **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **React** to deliver high-performance applications. My strong command over building REST and GraphQL APIs, alongside a solid foundation in microservices architecture, ensures the development of scalable and maintainable solutions. I have extensive experience in CI/CD processes and have successfully implemented **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and deployment, enhancing operational efficiencies.
I am adept at working in agile environments, delivering results through effective communication and collaboration within cross-functional teams. My background includes developing, testing, and deploying robust applications that comply with industry standards, alongside automated testing practices to ensure software quality. I also leverage my knowledge of event-driven architecture to streamline processes and improve application responsiveness, supporting overall project success.
